code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import logo from'./assets/images/logo-no-background-128x80.webp';import search from'./assets/images/icons8-search-50.png';import'./Nav and footer style/navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[menuOpen,setMenuOpen]=useState(false);const[isSticky,setIsSticky]=useState(false);const handleScroll=()=>{if(window.scrollY>200){setIsSticky(true);}else{setIsSticky(false);}};useEffect(()=>{window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar ".concat(isSticky?'sticky':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:menuOpen?"nav-links-menu":"nav-links",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(false),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"home",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about-us",className:"aboutus",children:"About Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/members",className:"members",children:"Art Club Membership"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/events",className:"events",children:"Attend Event"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"login-btn",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:search,alt:"searchicon"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"menu-icon",onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(!menuOpen),children:menuOpen?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-times"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-bars"})})]})})});};export default Navbar;
